items.title: Nigel Farage, leader of Reform UK party, says migrant's TikTok video 'chilling'
items.summary: LONDON (Reuters) -Nigel Farage, the leader of the populist Reform UK party which leads opinion polls in Britain, told a court on Tuesday an Afghan migrant's TikTok video about him while making apparent gun gestures was "chilling". Read full story

items.title: Anker’s 140W 4-port USB-C laptop charger with smart display is down to $60 for fall Prime Day (40% off)
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Techtober sale, Best Buy is offering Anker’s 140W 3-port USB-C GaN charger in silver for $59.99 shipped. This model typically sells for $100 but is now available at a hefty 40% discount. Today’s deal takes $40 off its usual price, marking the return of the best price we’ve seen yet – and $6 less than what it’s currently listed for at Amazon. One thing to note, though, is that Best Buy’s listing doesn’t mention the 240W braided cable that comes bundled when you buy from Amazon. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Labourer gets 26 years' jail, 10 strokes for raping 16-year-old stepdaughter
items.summary: SIBU: A labourer has been sentenced to 26 years in prison and 10 strokes of the cane for raping his 16-year-old stepdaughter twice in June. Read full story

items.title: xAI hires former Morgan Stanley banker Anthony Armstrong as CFO
items.summary: Armstrong, who advised Musk during his Twitter takeover, will oversee the finances of both xAI and X, which were merged in April, the report said.

items.title:
Woman asked me not to tell husband about finding pistol in car, cop tells court

‎
items.summary: KUALA SELANGOR: A police officer has told the Sessions Court here that a woman accused of possessing a pistol had asked him not to tell her husband about it as the firearm was supposed to be handed over to a buyer. Read full story

items.title: Robbery and rape suspect dies following struggle with cops
items.summary: KUALA LUMPUR: A 26-year-old man who allegedly posed as a delivery rider died following a struggle with police after being suspected of involvement in a robbery and rape case at a condominium in Wangsa Maju. Read full story

items.title: Family trio among seven charged with wrongful confinement in Pasir Puteh
items.summary: KOTA BARU: Seven individuals, including a family of three, pleaded not guilty in the Magistrate's Court here on Tuesday (Oct 7) to charges of wrongfully confining three men in Pasir Puteh last month. Read full story

items.title: Memo to Bari Weiss Re: CBS News: You’re doomed
items.summary: To: Bari Weiss RE: Good luck, babe! I honestly cannot believe you've willingly decided to go into the worst kind of job that exists: management at a dying company. This is the glass cliff to end all glass cliffs Managing sucks! It sucks even when you like the people you're managing and it's a low-stress […]

items.title: Freedom Flotilla humanitarian mission to enter Red Zone tomorrow
items.summary: KUALA LUMPUR: The Freedom Flotilla Coalition's (FFC) humanitarian mission to Gaza is expected to enter the red zone at 5am Malaysian time on Wednesday (Oct 8), bringing it closer to a high-risk area, said Humanitarian Care Malaysia (Mycare) chief executive officer Kamarul Zaman Shaharul Anwar. Read full story

items.title: You have a week to reconsider GRS decision, Kitingan tells rogue Sabah STAR reps
items.summary: KOTA KINABALU: Sabah STAR president Datuk Seri Dr Jeffrey Kitingan has given five incumbent assemblymen one week to reconsider their position to side with the decision to stay with Gabungan Rakyat Sabah (GRS). Read full story

items.title: Third person dies from methanol poisoning in Brazil
items.summary: Authorities are investigating the source of the tainted drinks, which have affected more than 200 people.

While we have seen the Porcelain model down this low previously at Amazon, it just started carrying the Haze variant recently and it is now down at the $84.99 shipped Amazon all-time low.

items.summary: Developing countries lead the historic clean energy charge but the US and EU rely more on fossil fuels than before, a think tank study shows.

The relatively bigger Echo Show 21 is also down to its lowest price at $349.99 shipped with a 13% markdown on its usual going rate of $400. Head below for more details.

items.title: Fall Prime Day drops Samsung’s 200MB/s 256GB PRO Ultimate microSD card to just $25, half TB for $55
items.summary:
As part of the ongoing fall Prime Day sale, Amazon is offering Samsung’s 256GB PRO Ultimate microSD + adapter combo for $24.99 Prime shipped. Don’t forget to clip the on-page $10 off coupon to see the discounted price during checkout. This memory card typically sells for $35 and is still listed at full price on Samsung’s own site, but Amazon currently has it at a solid 28% discount. Today’s deal knocks $10 off its usual going rate, matching the lowest price we’ve seen for this model. With the on-page coupon applied, this card is now only $1 more than the 128GB version. Meanwhile, the 512GB model with the included adapter is available for $54.99 shipped – once you clip the on-page coupon – matching one of the lowest prices we’ve seen for it. Head below for more details.
